Trustee_10_pre_2.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Trustee_10_pre_2.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated trustworthiness and pro-sociality by prioritizing transparency and fairness, proposing a profit-sharing plan that significantly benefitted the investor. This resulted in a successful investment with a 100% return, reflecting my competence in managing resources effectively. My reliable and responsible behavior has solidified my reputation as a trustworthy trustee, open to building collaborative relationships. Previous interactions are not documented as this is my first engagement.
